mapper.sql: rowid, DORM_CODE, PRO_NO, EMPLOYEENAME, EMPLOYEECODE, RENT_DATE, ESTIMATE_RETURN_DATE, RETURN_DATE, RENT_STATUS, FLOW_STATUS, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS, DORM_NAME
mapper.select: select t.*, t2.PRO_NAME, t3.DORM_NAME from gm_bm_bedrent t left join pm_base t2 on t2.pro_no=t.pro_no left join gm_bm_dorm t3 on t3.DORM_CODE = t.DORM_CODE where t.rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into gm_bm_bedrent (DORM_CODE, PRO_NO, EMPLOYEENAME, EMPLOYEECODE, RENT_DATE, ESTIMATE_RETURN_DATE, RETURN_DATE, RENT_STATUS, FLOW_STATUS, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS) values (#{dormCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{estimateReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{returnDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{rentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
0,
#{flowStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
1,
now(), null, null, 1, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update gm_bm_bedrent
DORM_CODE = #{dormCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NO = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEENAME = #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEECODE = #{employeecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RENT_DATE = #{rentDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ESTIMATE_RETURN_DATE = #{estimateReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE},
RETURN_DATE = #{returnDate,jdbcType=DATE},
RENT_STATUS = #{rentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLOW_STATUS = #{flowStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update gm_bm_bedrent set DORM_CODE = #{dormCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_NO = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEENAME = #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEECODE = #{employeecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RENT_DATE = #{rentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ESTIMATE_RETURN_DATE = #{estimateReturnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RETURN_DATE = #{returnDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RENT_STATUS = #{rentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOW_STATUS = #{flowStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update gm_bm_bedrent set
RENT_STATUS = #{rentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLOW_STATUS = #{flowStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = now() where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update gm_bm_bedrent set DORM_CODE = #{dormCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOW_STATUS = 4, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = now() where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select group_concat(t1.pro_no) as pro_no, group_concat(t2.pro_name) as pro_name from ( select pro_no from gm_bm_bedrent where dorm_code=#{dormCode} and rent_status=1 and flow_status=4 group by pro_no ) t1, pm_base t2 where t1.pro_no=t2.pro_no
